Excerpts from Latin literature with emphasis on both prose (e.g., Caesar, Cicero) and poetry (Vergil, Catullus).

Readings in Cicero's orations and philosophical works, stressing rhetorical techniques. Consideration of Cicero's
 role in Roman history and his place in Latin literature.
